attributes.action: Change in gun laws for self defence
attributes.additional_details:
We the public have a right to defend our selves when the police are unable to do so. Today in our cities the only people carrying guns are the criminals. A government that cannot guarantee the safety of the people should allow the people to defend themselves.

All of the gun laws should be reformed allowing all British citizens with good character to posses a concealed pistol for personal protection.

We should all have the right to protect our selves and our property. We should have the right to shoot a person or persons who threaten another person’s life or property.

When we live in an environment where the only people in possession of firearms are those intent in doing harm we are all in mortal danger.

Allow the law abiding people to protect them selves, let the people carry firearms.
